Deepfakes can be used to misinform, scam, or harm a person’s reputation by falsely depicting them saying or doing negative things. This is a serious problem that needs to be addressed. https://twitter.com/TheEconomist/status/1197213259604152320 …

In the last decade, technology has completely revolutionized Americans’ lives. With every innovation, Congress must ensure that we have guardrails in place to protect our country from the malicious use of technology like “deepfakes”.
